attributes.additional_details:
Truss is ruining our economy.
If she really cared about our country, our economy, she would resign.
Given she doesn't look like resigning, she needs to hear from the country - if she is so confident that her policies are the correct direction for this country, put it to the vote.
What are her policies? They change daily. She hasn't got a clue. 
Nobody in the UK wants an idiot for PM.
We must have a general election.
attributes.background:
Liz Truss has minimal confidence of the electorate. She didn't even have the confidence of conservative party members until it became her or Sunak.
She is hemorrhaging cabinet ministers daily.
Nobody in the general electorate voted for her.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
